tool_description: Dir. Kadata gives a single source updated directory for current top cryptocurrency news stories in the headlines around the world, provided to you via one API.
name: Crypto-API
title: Crypto-API

api_list.name: Get all stories from a specific source
api_list.description: Get all current headlines from a specified cryptocurrency news source with associated hyperlinks to stories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/cointelegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newssiteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Worldwide Crypto Headline Stories
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all cryptocurrency headlines available via crypto news sources.
